name: get_current_weather
description: Get comprehensive weather information for a location with support for current, historical, and forecast data
author: DurgasAI

input_parameters.name: location
input_parameters.description: The city and state/country, e.g. 'San Francisco, CA' or 'London, UK'

input_parameters.name: date
input_parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format for historical/forecast data. Leave empty for current weather

input_parameters.name: time
input_parameters.description: Time in HH:MM format (24-hour) for specific hourly data. Leave empty for current time

input_parameters.name: forecast_days
input_parameters.description: Number of forecast days (1-16). Only used when date is not specified

input_parameters.name: include_daily
input_parameters.description: Include daily weather summary (max/min temps, precipitation, etc.)

output_parameters.name: location_info
output_parameters.description: Location details including coordinates and timezone

output_parameters.name: api_info
output_parameters.description: API response metadata and data source information
